moreBlocks.articles:
• Auto Accidents
    The effects of a car accident are far reaching. The attorneys at Bremer & Trollop understand the Wisconsin Rules of the Road and the complexities of motor vehicle accidents.
  • Workers'Comp
    When you are injured on the job, it is the responsibility of your employer to cover your medical expenses and lost wages. By law, all employers must cover expenses resulting from employees' injuries received while on the job.
  • Hunting & Firearm Accidents
    While the vast majority of hunters in central Wisconsin follow safety guidelines, there are always exceptions to the rule. A hunting accident can forever change the life of the person injured.

description:
Bremer & Trollop Law Offices, S.C., has a location in Stevens Point, Wisconsin, from which they deliver unmatched advocacy and support to clients throughout Portage County and beyond who have serious personal injury or tortious claims involving any of the following:

  • Car, truck, motorcycle and other motor vehicle accidents
  • Slip-and-fall accidents and premises liability
  • Workplace accidents and workers' compensation
  • Farm accidents
  • Dog bites and animal attacks
  • Nursing home injuries
  • Asbestos, mesothelioma and toxic exposure
  • Surgical mesh claims, DePuy hip claims, and other defective medical device and dangerous pharmaceutical claims
  • Wrongful death

In practice for more than 30 years now, Bremer & Trollop Law Offices, S.C., has grown to include five total offices across the state. This makes the firm one of the region's most prominent legal practices for all areas of personal injury, and since they have secured millions of dollars in settlements and verdicts for their plaintiff clients, they are also one of the most successful.

Honored for their professionalism and service, the firm's attorneys have earned consistent top rankings and endorsements from their peers, including AV Preeminent peer review ratings* from Martindale-Hubbell and Top 100 Trial Lawyer rankings from the National Trial Lawyers. They have also received countless testimonials and referrals from their satisfied clients, which means you can rely on them for impassioned advocacy each step of the way to increase your chances for a favorable outcome.

For more information, you can contact Bremer & Trollop Law Offices, S.C., to schedule a free initial consultation. The firm also currently offers virtual consultations to help keep you safe and healthy in these uncertain times.

*AV®, AV Preeminent®, Martindale-Hubbell Distinguished and Martindale-Hubbell Notable are certification marks used under license in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell® is the facilitator of a peer review rating process. Ratings reflect the anonymous opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell® Peer Review RatingTM fall into two categories - legal ability and general ethical standards.
